page.description: Input your LNDHub credential URI here or scan the QR code with your webcam.

errors.connection_failed: Connection failed. Is your LNDHub URI correct?

page.title: Connect to <0>LNbits</0>
page.instructions: In LNbits, choose the wallet you want to connect, open it, click on API Info and copy the Admin Key. Paste it below:

errors.connection_failed: Connection failed. Do you have the correct URL and Admin Key?

page.title: Connect to <0>Eclair</0>
page.instructions: You need your Eclair URL and password.

page.title: Connect to <0>Citadel</0> node
page.instructions: This currently doesn't work if 2FA is enabled.

page.title: Connect to <0>Umbrel</0> node
page.instructions: In your Umbrel dashboard go to <0>Connect Wallet</0>. Select <0>lndconnect REST</0> and copy the <0>lndconnect URL</0>. (Depending on your setup you can either use the local connection or the Tor connection.)

page.title: Connect to <0>myNode</0>
page.instructions: On your myNode homepage click on the <0>Wallet</0> button for your <0>lightning</0> service.<1/> Now click on the <0>Pair Wallet</0> button under the <0>Status</0> tab. Enter your password when prompted.<1/> Select the dropdown menu and choose a pairing option. Depending on your setup you can either use the <0>lightning (REST + Local IP)</0> connection or the <0>lightning (REST + Tor)</0> connection.

page.title: Connect to your <0>Embassy</0> node
page.instructions: <0>Note:</0> Currently we only support LND but we will be adding c-lightning support in the future!<1/>On your Embassy dashboard click on the <0>lightning network Daemon</0> service.<1/>Select the <0>Properties</0> tab.<1/>Now copy the <0>LND Connect REST URL.</0>

page.title: Connect to your <0>RaspiBlitz</0> node
page.instructions1: Follow these steps:<1/> 1. <0>SSH</0> into your <0>Raspiblitz</0><1/>2. Select <0>Connect Apps & Show Credentials</0> from the list<1/><0/>3. Choose <0>Connect Alby to this node</0><1/>4. Press <0>OK</0> to display the connection credentials<1/><1/>Copy and paste the <0>REST API host</0> or the <0>.onion</0> address to connect through Tor into the input below.
page.instructions2: Copy the (admin) <0>macaroon</0> into the input below.

jwt.label: Enter your JWT token
jwt.info: The {{label}} login is currently being upgraded. If you are an advanced user, you can grab your JWT token by logging in via the <0>Web Wallet (wallet.mainnet.galoy.io)</0><1/><1/>The JWT looks like: <2>eyJhbG...</2><1/><1/>

page.title: Connect to your Core Lightning node

nostr.title: Nostr
nostr.hint: is a simple and open protocol that aims to create censorship-resistant social networks. Nostr works with cryptographic keys. To publish something you sign it with your key and send it to multiple relays. You can use Alby to manage your Nostr key. Many Nostr applications will then allow you to simply use the key from the Alby extension.

website_enhancements.title: Website enhancements
website_enhancements.subtitle: Tipping enhancements for Twitter, YouTube, etc.

lnurl_auth.title: LNURL-Auth
lnurl_auth.hint: is a generic authentication protocol. It authenticates the user using digital signatures. The protocol does not require any other identifying information such as passwords, emails, usernames, or similar. With Alby you can use your lightning accounts to securely login to websites. To be compatible with other wallets we had to make a few changes that you can configure here. <0>Ideally all those options are OFF.</0> Use them only if you have old accounts.

legacy_lnurl_auth_202207.title: Legacy LNURL-Auth
legacy_lnurl_auth_202207.subtitle: The key generation for LNURL-auth has changed (July 2022). Alby was not compatible with other implementations. This was changed, but now different login keys are used. If you used LNURL-auth to login before you can still enable the old method. This option will be removed later, make sure to switch to the new login.

legacy_lnurl_auth.title: Legacy signing for LNDhub and LNbits
legacy_lnurl_auth.subtitle: Message signing and login with LNDhub (e.g. BlueWallet) and LNbits accounts has been changed (March 2022). If you logged in with these accounts you can still enable the old signing method. This option will be removed later, make sure to switch to the new login.

nostr.hint: is a simple and open protocol that aims to create censorship-resistant social networks. Nostr works with cryptographic keys. To publish something you sign it with your key and send it to multiple relays. You can use Alby to manage your Nostr key. Many Nostr applications will then allow you to simply use the key from the Alby extension.

commando.bkpr-listbalances: List of all current and historical account balances.
commando.checkmessage: Verify that the signature was generated by a given node.
commando.connect: Establish a new connection with another node.
commando.decodepay: Check and parse a bolt11 string.
commando.disconnect: Close an existing connection to a peer.
commando.feerates: Return the feerates that CLN will use.
commando.fundchannel: Open a payment channel with a peer by committing a funding transaction.
commando.getinfo: Get the summary of the node.
commando.getroute: Find the best route for the payment to a lightning node.
commando.invoice: Create the expectation of a payment.
commando.keysend: Send a payment to another node.
commando.listforwards: List all htlcs that have been attempted to be forwarded.
commando.listinvoices: Get the status of all invoices.
commando.listnodes: List nodes the node has learned about via gossip messages.
commando.listoffers: List all offers or get a specific offer.
commando.listpays: Gets the status of all pay commands.
commando.listpeers: List nodes that are connected or have open channels with this node.
commando.listsendpays: Gets the status of all sendpay commands.
commando.listtransactions: List transactions tracked in the wallet.
commando.multifundchannel: Open multiple payment channels with nodes by committing a single funding transaction.
commando.pay: Send a payment to a BOLT11 invoice.
commando.sendpay: Send a payment via a route.
commando.setchannel: Configure fees / htlc range advertized for a channel.
commando.signmessage: Create a signature from this node.

lnd.estimatefee: Estimate the fee rate and total fees for a transaction.
lnd.getchaninfo: Get the network announcement for the given channel.
lnd.getnetworkinfo: Get basic stats about the known channel graph.
lnd.getnodeinfo: Get the channel information for a node.
lnd.gettransactions: Get a list of all transactions relevant to the wallet.
lnd.listpayments: Get a list of all outgoing payments.
lnd.listpeers: Get a list all currently active peers.
lnd.verifymessage: Verify a signature over a msg.
lnd.sendtoroute: Make a payment via the specified route.
lnd.routermc: Read the internal mission control state.
